amendment.description: To make available from Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Navy, up to $2,000,000 for the Advanced Airship Flying Laboratory.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4778 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4778 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Smith. (consideration: CR S8590-8591; text: CR S8590) To make available from Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Navy, up to $2,000,000 for the Advanced Airship Flying Laboratory.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4778 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4778 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Smith.
